---
title: "aula11"
format: html

execute: 
  freeze: auto
  cache: true
  warning: false
---

::: {.cell hash='aula11_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_aa54093e6ab7ba6da0093ea02eae7b66'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
dat <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "fungicida_vaso")

dat2 <- dat |> 
  # mutate para criar uma variável
  mutate(inc = dis_sp / n_sp*100)

dat2 |>
  ggplot(aes(x = treat,
             y = inc))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  facet_wrap(~ dose)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula11_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_828314009a12aa45aed2659e3b3212fd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <- aov(log(inc +0.5) ~ treat*dose,
          data = dat2)
summary(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
            Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value  Pr(>F)   
treat        1 12.928  12.928  13.980 0.00179 **
dose         1  5.663   5.663   6.124 0.02491 * 
treat:dose   1  5.668   5.668   6.129 0.02486 * 
Residuals   16 14.796   0.925                   
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Non-normality of residuals detected (p = 0.050).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# p=0.050 considera-se dados normais.
check_heteroscedasticity(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.180).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(DHARMa)
plot(simulateResiduals(m1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(emmeans)
means_m1 <- emmeans(m1, ~ dose | treat,
                    type = "response")
means_m1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
treat = Ionic liquid:
 dose response     SE df lower.CL upper.CL
  0.5    27.05 11.847 16   10.570    68.05
  2.0     3.10  1.412 16    1.065     7.77

treat = Tebuconazole:
 dose response     SE df lower.CL upper.CL
  0.5     1.21  0.737 16    0.188     3.76
  2.0     1.42  0.925 16    0.194     4.83

Confidence level used: 0.95 
Intervals are back-transformed from the log(mu + 0.5) scale 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(multcompView)
library(multcomp)
# para comparar as médias.
cld(means_m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
treat = Ionic liquid:
 dose response     SE df lower.CL upper.CL .group
  2.0     3.10  1.412 16    1.065     7.77  1    
  0.5    27.05 11.847 16   10.570    68.05   2   

treat = Tebuconazole:
 dose response     SE df lower.CL upper.CL .group
  0.5     1.21  0.737 16    0.188     3.76  1    
  2.0     1.42  0.925 16    0.194     4.83  1    

Confidence level used: 0.95 
Intervals are back-transformed from the log(mu + 0.5) scale 
Tests are performed on the log scale 
significance level used: alpha = 0.05 
NOTE: If two or more means share the same grouping symbol,
      then we cannot show them to be different.
      But we also did not show them to be the same. 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# para calcular o coeficiente de variação
library(agricolae)
cv.model(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 65.04818
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula11_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_390a59e148315a8e1fb14716a309413c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", 
                    "armazena")
milho2 <- milho |> 
  filter(tempo == 8)

milho2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(factor(tipo), peso_mil,
             color = factor(umidade)))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  facet_wrap(~umidade)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
m2 <- aov(peso_mil ~ factor(tipo)*factor(umidade),
          data = milho2)
summary(m2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value   Pr(>F)    
factor(tipo)                  1  11215   11215  2375.8 3.64e-15 ***
factor(umidade)               2  42814   21407  4534.8  < 2e-16 ***
factor(tipo):factor(umidade)  2   2329    1165   246.7 1.79e-10 ***
Residuals                    12     57       5                     
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula11_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_32a79c59ef3424e3b2e77c5a04ad87e1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#quando não houver significãncia entre a interação, testar as variáveis independentes.
milho3 <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", 
                    "milho")

m4 <- aov(yield ~ hybrid,
          data = milho3)
summary(m4)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
            Df    Sum Sq  Mean Sq F value   Pr(>F)    
hybrid       5 105876446 21175289   8.688 1.02e-05 ***
Residuals   42 102371996  2437428                     
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(m4)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.763).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(simulateResiduals(m4))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula11_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_m4 <- emmeans(m4, ~ hybrid)
medias_m4
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 hybrid   emmean  SE df lower.CL upper.CL
 30F53 HX  10598 552 42     9484    11712
 30F53 YH   9309 552 42     8195    10423
 30K64     11018 552 42     9904    12132
 30S31H     8652 552 42     7538     9765
 30S31YH    8056 552 42     6942     9170
 BG7049H   12402 552 42    11288    13516

Confidence level used: 0.95 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#Tuckey
cld(medias_m4)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 hybrid   emmean  SE df lower.CL upper.CL .group
 30S31YH    8056 552 42     6942     9170  1    
 30S31H     8652 552 42     7538     9765  12   
 30F53 YH   9309 552 42     8195    10423  123  
 30F53 HX  10598 552 42     9484    11712   234 
 30K64     11018 552 42     9904    12132    34 
 BG7049H   12402 552 42    11288    13516     4 

Confidence level used: 0.95 
P value adjustment: tukey method for comparing a family of 6 estimates 
significance level used: alpha = 0.05 
NOTE: If two or more means share the same grouping symbol,
      then we cannot show them to be different.
      But we also did not show them to be the same. 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
pwpm(medias_m4)
```
